text.__SUMMARY__: Marx's worm snake (Ramphotyphlops marxi ) is a species of snake in the family Typhlopidae. The species is endemic to the Philippines.
text.Etymology: The specific name, marxi, is in honor of American herpetologist Hymen Marx.
text.Geographic range: R. marxi is known only from Samar island in the central Philippines.
text.Further reading: Wallach V (1993). "A New Species of Blind Snake, Typhlops marxi, from the Philippines (Serpentes: Typhlopidae)". Raffles Bull. Zool. 41 (2): 263-278.
